CEO and inventor of Air Cashew,
translation.es: director ejecutivo e inventor de Air Cashew,

translation.en: the world's first airline owned by just me.
translation.es: la primera aerolínea del mundo únicamente mía.

translation.en: I hope you love adventure because it's time to flew.
translation.es: Espero que sean aventureros, porque es hora de volar.

translation.en: - After 30 years... - What?
...in the rat and mustard business,
I saved up enough money to buy my own airline.
translation.es: ahorré lo suficiente para comprarme una aerolínea.

translation.en: - Me even designed the uniforms. -
Spiffo!
Beverage? We have hot soda and warm hair.
translation.es: ¿Bebida? Tengo refresco caliente y cabello caliente.

translation.en: - No, thank you. - Ew.
We're committed to staying in the air once we've taken off.
translation.es: Nos comprometemos a permanecer en el aire tras el despegue.

translation.en: - - And now, it's Pine Cone Time!
translation.es: ¡Llegó la hora de las piñas de pino!

translation.en: Our air is different - - from other airlines,
but I won't tell you how.
translation.es: pero no les diré cómo lo hacemos.

translation.en: - We're gonna die! - Gonna die. Your words, not mine.
translation.es: - ¡Vamos a morir! - Vamos a morir. Lo dijeron ustedes.

translation.en: I prefer words like
truffle pig, hot scrod, goose dust,
translation.es: cerdo trufero, bacalao caliente, polvo de ganso.

translation.en: - We're gonna die. - and the Spanish word for dream, sueño.
translation.es: Y mi palabra en español favorita: sueño.

translation.en: It took a big, hot sueño to sew this plane together.
translation.es: Necesité un sueño grande y caliente para coser este avión.

translation.en: - Sew? - So,
all our planes are homemade and FDA- certified, nom nom.
translation.es: Nuestros aviones son caseros y comestibles. Qué delicia.

translation.en: I tried to buy my own sports team,
translation.es: Traté de comprar mi propio equipo deportivo,

translation.en: but no one wanted to be called the Denver Doodles of Nashville.
translation.es: pero ninguno quería llamarse Las Bolitas de Nashville.

translation.en: So I turned my sights to the skies.
translation.es: Así que puse mis ojos en el cielo.

translation.en: I can't believe this is happening.
- - Did you say I?
- - Danni, - in 3C. -
Okay. Okay.
Better not complain,
or we'll have to wake up the pilot.
translation.es: o tendremos que despertar al piloto.

translation.en: - - Just kidding! It's me,
and welcome to Cashew Air,
the only airline where you can earn...
translation.es: la única aerolínea donde pueden ganar... puntos.

translation.en: So, fasten your meatbelts,
- - and go to sleep,
- - because you're on Cashew Air.
Cashew Air!
- Something is wrong with me. -
